name: ScrubDubDub
0:
”Alexa open scrub dub dub”
”Alexa ask scrub dub dub help me wash my hands”
”Alexa tell scrub dub dub tell me a fact about handwashing”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: scrub dub dub
des:
Ask Alexa to open Scrub Dub Dub to help you wash your hands for 20 seconds. Alexa will tell you a fact about handwashing and will help you count for 20 seconds while you scrub your hands. 

Scrub Dub Dub provides interesting facts about handwashing the whole family can enjoy while helping keeping your family healthy by properly washing your hands.

To start, just say "Alexa, open Scrub Dub Dub" to get a fact and get help washing your hands".

At anytime, you can stop by saying "Alexa, stop"
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
